channel.title: Second Message: Twizard‚Äôs Birthday EP
channel.description:
1 year and 2 days 12 months and 2 days 367 days This is my first EP and since my first song (I have posted some songs before but deleted them) was named first message and also was my first message, this‚Äôll be my second message, an EP. my first message was 2 days before my birthday, the second message is on my birthday. I wanna thank y‚Äôall for this amazing 367 days, the ones who listened to my music and the ones that gave feedback to me, I‚Äôve improved so much and I‚Äôm really happy with my music career now, thank you
This is also the day that I‚Äôll start with a new big project: I‚Äôll make a track and I‚Äôll work a whole year on it, I‚Äôll still upload some songs, but less than normal. Again, thanks.
Thanks to @kheeshKP and @tictacto for letting me remix their awesome tracks Thanks to @PISTOL for collabing with me, it was an honorüôèüôè https://soundcloud.com/twizard-official/sets/second-message-twizards

item.description:
1 year and 2 days
12 months and 2 days
367 days
This is my first EP and since my first song (I have posted some songs before but deleted them) was named first message and also was my first message, this‚Äôll be my second message, an EP. my first message was 2 days before my birthday, the second message is on my birthday.
I wanna thank y‚Äôall for this amazing 367 days, the ones who listened to my music and the ones that gave feedback to me, I‚Äôve improved so much and I‚Äôm really happy with my music career now, thank you

This is also the day that I‚Äôll start with a new big project: I‚Äôll make a track and I‚Äôll work a whole year on it, I‚Äôll still upload some songs, but less than normal. Again, thanks.

Thanks to @kheeshKP and @tictacto for letting me remix their awesome tracks
